name: SoftCrop Technologies
overview: SoftCrop is a rapidly growing IT company with extensive experience in designing and developing cutting edge IT solutions for client representing a broad cross-section of business. SoftCrop have developed generalized solutions as well as solutions based on specific customer requirements, using the latest, creative and revolutionary tools available. SoftCrop are an integrated IT resources center that began its corporate journey in 2008. With a corporate mission focused on providing software development support and solutions to a quality-conscious clientele around the world. As a technology company, it is the people that defines the company, and hence it ensure that the technical skills of its team is constantly kept up-to-date with the demands and opportunities of the times.
